name: Michele Fremont
seeking: Seeks JV partners who work with mission-driven entrepreneurs, nonprofit leaders, or social impact professionals who need clarity and strategic direction. Would benefit from partnerships with impact investing networks, social entrepreneurship communities, or values-aligned business educators whose clients are building purpose-driven ventures. Co-promotions with changemaker-focused podcasts, workshops, or conferences would expand visibility among the target audience.

what_you_do: Coaches changemakers to gain clarity on their mission and purpose for greater social impact.
offering: Delivers professional services and strategic solutions through Changemaker Clarity.
